NavBarLinks.main_description: Explore the main page of Botiskaf, your ultimate crypto trading assistant. Learn more about its features and benefits.
NavBarLinks.main_keywords: Botiskaf, crypto trading bot, main page, home, crypto bot, trading assistant

NavBarLinks.faq_description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about Botiskaf, its strategies, and features.

NavBarLinks.pricing_description: Learn about Botiskaf's pricing plans and find the best option for your crypto trading needs.

MainPage.title: Main
MainPage.welcome_message: Welcome to the world of automated trading!
MainPage.for_automated_trading: for automated trading on the exchange
MainPage.why_us_bullet_one_part_two: : We're not a huge corporation, so we pay attention to details and consider user needs
MainPage.why_us_bullet_two_part_two: : Our bot is designed for maximum simplicity and productivity
MainPage.why_us_bullet_three_part_two: : We're constantly working on improving and adding new features
MainPage.why_us_bullet_four_part_two: : We're honest with our users and open to feedback and suggestions
MainPage.why_us_bullet_five_part_two: : Our bot is suitable for both beginners and experienced traders
MainPage.about_us_description: We are a small team of developers and enthusiasts united by the desire to create convenient and efficient tools for successful trading. Over the years in the crypto space, we have accumulated valuable experience and are happy to share our developments with you.
